I reached out here, I reached out to my sponsor, I reached out to my home group and my family. ... I wanted to thank all of you who responded to my previous post and encourage anyone who may read this another day. We can do it, and it's not shameful to be afraid and work through that fear with others.
Guess I just needed to get this out, and keep myself accountable because the shame and the obsession were starting to take my brain through the spin cycle. Thanks for reading.
I need some support and some conversation

My only intention here is to be helpful to others, as well as to my self! Writing and sharing really helps me with my own recovery. ... Good luck everyone with your own personal journeys. We have to try to remember that we deserve to treat ourselves with the same powerful kind of love that we gave to our drug of choice. I hope everyone reading this is having an amazing day and is being safe. I truly thank you for taking the time to read a little piece of my mind today :).

I encourage anyone who wants to make that change to realize that you already do know, in your heart, that you are fully capable of changing. I encourage you to truly, completely believe that if you have had the strength to endure the never-ending storm of ALL of the shit that accompanies the horrible road of addiction, then you ABSOLUTELY have the strength to conquer it, and put it (and leave it) in the past where it belongs. Much love to everyone.

I am especially interested in hearing what everyone else here thinks- and any stories or thoughts or feelings that anyone wants to share. I would love to hear from anyone going through this very difficult journey.
as I’m curious if anyone has ever thought about this, and what you all think about this

I am thinking of you, and that things will work out. You know you’re ready to make that step towards getting clean. Don’t put it off, as you know you can do that forever, and suddenly it’s 20 years later. Do it tonight/tomorrow. Take that one baby step- that could lead toward a path that you will one day look back on and be so unbelievably grateful for and proud of. I love you all. Be safe and take care everyone :)
